org.objectstyle.cayenne.query
Class SqlModifyQuery

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.query.AbstractQuery
        |
        +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.query.SqlModifyQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Query
Deprecated. Since 1.1 use SQLTemplate.

public class SqlModifyQuery
extends AbstractQuery

Allows to send "raw" SQL INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE statements or stored procedure calls to the database using Cayenne connection layer. It is intended to allow programmers to access database-specific features not covered by Cayenne. Queries created using SqlModifyQuery are very likely not portable accross database engines.
